Text: Enron FullTime PositionDear Mr Shankman Hows it going As you may remember I met you Mr LeBeau Ms Leibman and Ms Li Sun at Cavanaughs with Matt Commons a few weeks ago During that meeting you suggested that I visit Enron down in Houston in the next few weeks As I have not been placed on the closed interview list at Wharton I was wondering if I could conduct the interview process while in Houston Please see my updated resume attached for your review Please let me know if this would be possible I am still very interested in obtaining a fulltime position in the Associate Program at Enron Kind regards Edward Divgi Attachment Resume Resume Aditya Edward DIVGI Wharton MBA doc
